entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
